availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Rankin (Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter. Ohio native. Married to Lucy Hardin Rankin in Oldham County, Kentucky, in January 1837. Resident of Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1840. Owned one enslaved person in Oldham County in 1840. Farmer and Carpenter in Oldham County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1850. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 1, p. 150A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 898.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 171A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Brownsboro, p. 19B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film 000482445.
"John B. Rankin (1808-1877)," Find A Grave, Memorial 83874868, accessed March 21, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/83874868.
